tweet_text:
@mattatarms @ClarkHELLSCREAM I remember when the deck builder was laughably bad.  All it did was fill the deck to even out the mana curve w/ junk in your collection; no synergy at all.
When they finally updated the UI, it was huge!  One of the best updates to come to Hearthstone.
